author: rgreig
msg: Implements interop tests compatable with the existing topic tests. Used to succesfully test the field table changes.

author: rgreig
msg: This adds some interop tests (which are just copies of the existing topic tests) in a new integrationtests module. The java 1.4. client build has been updated to be able to run these tests. They succesfully talk to each other and the .net code. This is intended to be a starting point of a more in depth interop test as per the spec, but does not implement what is in the draft spec yet.

author: varlax
msg: Partial fix to HARMONY-3197 [drlvm][jit][winx64] Jitrino compilation fixed`.
Tested on SUSE10@ia32, SUSE9@x64, WinXP@ia32, Win2003@x64, SUSE9@ipf

author: aadamchik
msg: optimizing maven build - pushing mdimension repo down to the modeler modules

msg: Changed the Search field widget of the Search View from Text to Combo, to be able to access to recent searches.
